options.b: A JavaScript library for building web components

title: What is the primary purpose of Polymer?

options.b: Building web components and applications

title: What are 'web components' in the context of Polymer?

options.b: Reusable and encapsulated UI elements for web development
options.c: Components used in virtual reality applications

title: How does Polymer help in building web components?

options.b: By offering a framework for creating and managing web components
options.c: By offering domain names for websites
options.d: By providing a library for building physical components

title: What is the core idea behind Polymer's design?

options.b: Simplicity, reusability, and encapsulation
